description: This scene with Samantha Sin was shot way back when Public Disgrace just got rolling. I was in Europe shooting some streets scenes, so Claire directed this shoot while an affiliate party was taking place at the armory. Claire puts Samantha in tight rope bondage and has her perform tricks for the crowd. She gives a midget a handjob, spreads her holes for all to see, and then gets fucked like a whore while people take pictures. Stay tuned for the BONUS UPDATE on Monday.
title: Samantha Sin fucked in front of live audience
